targets.expr:
avg (
    average_dcgm_gpu_utilization{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 1) +
    min_dcgm_gpu_utilization{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 2) +
    max_dcgm_gpu_utilization{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 3)
)

avg (
    average_dcgm_mem_copy_utilization{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 1) +
    min_dcgm_mem_copy_utilization{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 2) +
    max_dcgm_mem_copy_utilization{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 3)
)

(
    average_ib_port_xmit_data{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 1) +
    min_ib_port_xmit_data{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 2) +
    max_ib_port_xmit_data{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 3)
)

(
    average_ib_port_rcv_data{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 1) +
    min_ib_port_rcv_data{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 2) +
    max_ib_port_rcv_data{subscription="$Subscription", cluster="$Cluster",job_id=~"$JobId"} * ($Operation== bool 3)
)
